document.full_text: hundreds of iraqi shi'ites rallied in baghdad on saturday to demand the immediate withdrawal of saudi troops from bahrain, which has sparked reminders of iraq's own sectarian divide.
document.title: iraqi shi'ites want saudis to withdraw from bahrain
lines_and_colors: hundreds of iraqi shi'ites rallied in baghdad on saturday to demand the immediate withdrawal of saudi troops from bahrain, which has sparked reminders of iraq's own sectarian divide.
